title: Marketplace for Friday, June 5, 2015
description: Airing on Friday, June 5, 2015: The U.S. suspects Chinese hackers took the names, addresses, financial information and, possibly, Social Security numbers of more than 4 million people stored at the government's Office of Personnel Management. We look at the potential cascading effect of the hack. Next in our series Behind the Blue Line: Sally Herships explores the growing number of private cops across the nation as we debate the effectiveness and training of police officers.
